description: head and neck of a man facing right with eyes looking at the viewer and a slight smile on his face; a thick band of black lines form an outline around the head and neck
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: E.199 | LRC of sheet, in pencil: 50. | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 1734
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 25 / Barcelona. | LL in pencil, below image: Tyl Uilenspiegel
title: Till Uilenspiegel (Self-Portrait)
